import React,{useState} from 'react' import './booking.css'; import { Form, FormGroup, List, ListGroup, ListGroupItem, Button } from 'reactstrap'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; const Booking = ({tour, avgRating}) => { const {price,reviews} = tour; const navigate = useNavigate() const [credentials, setCredentials] = useState({ userId: '01', userEmail:'arpit@123.com', fullName:'', phome: '', guestSize:1, bookAt:'' }) const handleChange = e =>{ setCredentials(prev=>({...prev, [e.target.id]:e.target.value})) }; const serviceFee = 10; const totalAmount = Number(price) * Number(credentials.guestSize) + Number(serviceFee) const handleClick = e =>{ e.preventDefault() // console.log(credentials) navigate("/thank-you") } return (

${price} /per person

{avgRating === 0? null:avgRating} ({reviews?.length})
Information
{/* */} {/* */}
${price} 1 person
${price}
Service Charge
${serviceFee}
Total
${totalAmount}
) } export default Booking
